column1: I've been using the serum for two months and on my second bottle (: I use it Faithfully , and you have to moisturize your face (: and what I love about this product is there isn't a lot ingredients which is perfect (: the formula is awesome ! The product itself is lightweight and a little bit goes a long way so the value is definitely worth the price. Use in conjunction with the 10% Vitamin C Serum to even away wrinkles while hydrating twice a day for great results. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I��ve tried other hyaluronic acid serums in the past but this one killed the game! My skin felt so amazing after this very first use!! I'll keep using and buying this product for a long time! Great formula guys! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
